title: This chair needs a font
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm a little stuck.

I'm just learning design and wondering if you could help me pick a font.

It's actually for a new product but using an old illustration of a chair.

I'm actually looking to use a main font and then a different font for smaller text underneath BUT any help would be appreciated.

Thanks so much..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417121205im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thronesmall_5520.jpg)
author: jbm15

comments.content: Scala—Serif, Sans, and the Jewel style.
Scala—Serif, Sans, and the Jewel style, and Seria.

Thanks so much Nick, that really is helpful. Looks great so I will go with that.

All the best to you!

Jason
Glad that helped! I have no idea why Scala Jewel popped into my head. Martin Majoor is a Facebook friend—but he has recently posted about his new design, Questa, not Scala.
